column1: Run a binary or example of the local package
--bin <NAME>...              Name of the bin target to run
--example <NAME>...          Name of the example target to run

column2: --package <SPEC>             Package with the target to run

column1: --profile <PROFILE-NAME>     Build artifacts with the specified profile
--features <FEATURES>...     Space or comma separated list of features to activate

column2: --verbose                    Use verbose output (-vv very verbose/build.rs output)

column1: --frozen                     Require Cargo.lock and cache are up to date
--locked                     Require Cargo.lock is up to date
Run `cargo help run` for more detailed information.
